main event: On 9 May 1958, a bright white cigar-shaped object was observed by a witness in Marietta, Ohio, traveling at approximately 50 mph.
interesting points: The object was noted to be cigar-shaped covering 10-15 degrees of the sky., The witness described seeing four lights in color at the front and a bright white light at the rear., The witness reported observing this object multiple times before, with variations in colors of the lights., Investigators found no corroborating evidence of a UFO in the area during the time of the sighting., The source of the report was deemed unreliable, with indications of a fabricated story.
sighted object: a bright white cigar-shaped object with lights
witness description: The source was described as having no visible means of support, living a strange lifestyle with nocturnal habits.
